entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are affecting the road this morning and another 5 to 10 cm may settle on the road. Snow may to turn to rain for a time this afternoon, but changing to snow showers again tonight when a further 1 to 3 cm may settle on the road above 400 metres.
